title: When Rahul Gandhi enacted PM Narendra Modi's reaction to his request to waive off farmers' loan - Watch | Zee News
text:
﻿ When Rahul Gandhi enacted PM Narendra Modi's reaction to his request to waive off farmers' loan - Watch By Kamna Arora | Last Updated: Friday, February 17, 2017 - 16:44 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
Raebareli: Congress vice president Rahul Gandhi on Friday drew laughter when he enacted Prime Minister Narendra Modi's response to his request to waive off the loan of farmers. 
Addressing a rally in Raebareli, which was attended by his sister and Congress' star campaigner Priyanka Gandhi Vadra, Rahul said it would take PM Modi just 15 minutes if he wants to forgive farmers' debt. “Why is he not doing it,” asked Gandhi. 
The Congress leader added that Modi makes hollow promises and accused the PM of snatching food park project from Raebareli, a parliamentary seat held by his mother Sonia Gandhi, "to take revenge". 
Watch the video here: #WATCH : Rahul Gandhi speaking in Raebareli on PM Narendra Modi's reaction when he asked him (PM) to waive off farmers' loan. #uppolls pic.twitter.com/BqmWJGEfB6 
— ANI UP (@ANINewsUP) February 17, 2017 
After weeks of dilly-dallying, postponements and cancellations, Priyanka Gandhi Vadra today attended the rally addressed by her brother and Congress vice president Rahul Gandhi.
